settings.info: This is for advanced users only, NerdlySolutions is not responsible for unexpected problems when custom code is added to the Conversio theme

settings.label: Image
settings.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32x32

settings.label: Animation entrance class
settings.info: Enter an animation class name from [Animate.css](https://animate.style).

options.label: hinge (more for a joke not useful)

settings.label: Animation exit class
settings.info: Enter an animation class name from [Animate.css](https://animate.style).

options.label: hinge (more for a joke not useful)

settings.label: Use Ajax
settings.info: Only works for mailchimp and klaviyo.

settings.label: Klaviyo list ID
settings.info: [Find your list ID](https://help.klaviyo.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005078647-Find-a-List-ID).

settings.label: Klaviyo api key
settings.info: [Find your api key](https://help.klaviyo.com/hc/en-us/articles/360002035871-Install-Klaviyo-js-to-Publish-Signup-Forms#install-the-signup-form-code-snippet1).

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Find your MailChimp form action URL](https://wiki.the4.co/?manual_kb=updated-get-mailchimp-action-url).

settings.label: Show live visitors (not real visitors, coming in an update)

settings.info: Icons are from Fontawesome [Learn more](https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&m=free)
settings.label: Icon

settings.info: Place [visitors] where you want the number to display
settings.label: Message for visitors
settings.default: there are currently [visitors] viewing this product

settings.label: Hide this collections from the list
settings.info: Enter a list a collections (by handle) separated with a comma e.g: "frontpage, women"

settings.content: Toast is used to display various important global messages usually via ajax. (E.g: When adding products to cart) [Learn more about toasts](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.5/components/toasts/)

settings.label: Animation exit class
settings.info: Animation class name form [Animate.css](https://animate.style).

options.label: hinge (more for a joke not useful)

settings.label: Animation entrance class
settings.info: Enter an animation class name from [Animate.css](https://animate.style).

options.label: hinge (more for a joke not useful)

settings.label: Show Controls
settings.info: Prev/Next buttons

settings.label: Show Thumbnails
settings.info: Small images at the bottom

settings.label: Autoplay time
settings.info: Select '0' to disable
Cropping images helps with load optimization, stop the page from loading full resolution
settings.label: Product image crop
Image height (px)
settings.info: Note: Enter 0 to have auto height

settings.label: Transition effect
settings.info: On slide change

settings.label: Enable button animation
settings.info: Will animate every 5 seconds to get user attention.

settings.label: Button animation class
settings.info: Enter an animation class name from [Animate.css](https://animate.style).
